pages.contact: Contact Vantage Hotel-Casino | Get in Touch with Us Home Casino Contact Us Abous Us Home Casino Contact Us Abous Us Get in Touch with Vantage Hotel-Casino We are here to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have. At Vantage Hotel-Casino, we value your feedback and are committed to providing excellent customer service. Whether you need help with reservations, have inquiries about our amenities, or want to share your experience, our team is ready to assist you. Contact Us Now Contact Us Please fill out the form below to get in touch with us. We will respond to your message as soon as possible. For immediate assistance, feel free to call us at our customer service number or email us directly at vantage@gmail.com. First Name Last Name Email Message I accept privacy policy Submit Frequently Asked Questions What are the check-in and check-out times? Check-in time is at 3:00 PM and check-out time is at 11:00 AM. Early check-in and late check-out requests are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. What amenities are available at Vantage Hotel-Casino? We offer a range of amenities including free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, a swimming pool, multiple dining options, and a state-of-the-art casino. Is parking available at the hotel? Yes, we offer complimentary parking for all our guests. Valet parking services are also available. Do you offer airport shuttle services? Yes, we provide airport shuttle services for our guests. Please contact our front desk to arrange your transportation. Are pets allowed at Vantage Hotel-Casino? We do not allow pets at our hotel-casino, with the exception of service animals. What dining options are available on-site? We offer a variety of dining options including a gourmet restaurant, a casual café, and a 24-hour room service menu. How can I make a reservation? You can make a reservation online through our website, or by calling our reservations team directly. We recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred dates. What is your cancellation policy? Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours prior to your scheduled arrival date to avoid charges. Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival will incur a one-night stay charge. Is there a dress code for the casino? We ask that guests dress in smart casual attire when visiting the casino. Swimwear, flip-flops, and tank tops are not permitted. How can I contact Vantage Hotel-Casino? You can contact us via email at vantage@gmail.com or by calling our customer service number. We are here to assist you with any questions or concerns. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Vantage Hotel-Casino Policies and Regulations Home Casino Contact Us Abous Us Home Casino Contact Us Abous Us Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Welcome to Vantage Hotel-Casino. By using our website and services, you agree to these terms and conditions. 2. Booking and Reservations All reservations are subject to availability. We reserve the right to cancel any booking at our discretion. 3. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 11:00 AM. Requests for early check-in or late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. 4. Payment Policy Full payment is required upon arrival. We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and cash. 5. Cancellation Policy Cancellations must be made 24 hours before your arrival date to avoid charges. Late cancellations will incur a one-night stay fee. 6. Liability Vantage Hotel-Casino is not responsible for any loss or damage to personal belongings. Guests should take necessary precautions. 7. Conduct Guests must behave respectfully. Disruptive behavior may result in removal without refund. 8. Changes to Terms We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of our services indicates acceptance of any changes. 9. Contact Us For any questions, please email us at vantage@gmail.com.
